html: Short summary of how the Trump Budget will impact WNY: - Assumes repeal of the ACA - Ends HEAP - Eliminates CDBG - Cuts #GLRI funding by 90% - Reduces NIH by $4.9B, including a $897M cut to cancer research - Cuts Army Corps funds by 1/3 MORE DETAILS:https://higgins.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/congressman-higgins-responds-to-the-president-s-proposed-2020-budget …
text:
Short summary of how the Trump Budget will impact WNY:
- Assumes repeal of the ACA
- Ends HEAP
- Eliminates CDBG
- Cuts #GLRI funding by 90%
- Reduces NIH by $4.9B, including a $897M cut to cancer research
- Cuts Army Corps funds by 1/3
MORE DETAILS:https://higgins.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/congressman-higgins-responds-to-the-president-s-proposed-2020-budget …

html: #OTD in 1965 peaceful protesters rallying for #votingrights were met by troopers with billy clubs after crossing the Edmund Pettus Bridge in what became known as #BloodySunday. In 2013 I joined civil rights leader @repjohnlewis, who was there that day, on a visit to the site.pic.twitter.com/yysJLAUzxB

html: The lake side of Buffalo's Waterfront is going to get 12-million dollars in work, from dredging to repairing the long system of breakwaters which keep the harbor and the Niagara River safe from Lake Erie on those bad winter days. The Army Corps of Engineers will do the work.

html: State DEC says the shutdown of operations at Tonawanda Coke has been safely completed. Gas lines has been completely purged and all coke ovens are empty. DEC and EPA are on-site to assess environmental conditions and investigate contamination.
text: State DEC says the shutdown of operations at Tonawanda Coke has been safely completed. Gas lines has been completely purged and all coke ovens are empty. DEC and EPA are on-site to assess environmental conditions and investigate contamination.

html: A century ago, on October 14, 1918, @USArmy Private Walter Rydzewski was injured during WWI, with wounds that eventually took his life. Today, on behalf of a grateful nation, we presented his family with the Purple Heart and other medals during a ceremony in Depew.pic.twitter.com/CKjHdpRajF
text: A century ago, on October 14, 1918, @USArmy Private Walter Rydzewski was injured during WWI, with wounds that eventually took his life.  Today, on behalf of a grateful nation, we presented his family with the Purple Heart and other medals during a ceremony in Depew.pic.twitter.com/CKjHdpRajF

html: 100 years ago today @USArmy Pvt. Walter Rydzewski was wounded in battle during WWI. Today we present his grandson, a retired Army officer himself, with his grandfather's Purple Heart.pic.twitter.com/WNVo1Wc8Rk

html: The Outer Harbor is one of Buffalo's greatest assets and today we announced plans to continue it's revitalization. $5 million dollars in state funding is going towards new bike trails and recreational spaces for everyone who visits to enjoy starting next spring!pic.twitter.com/HM6PDj2CIL
text: The Outer Harbor is one of Buffalo's greatest assets and today we announced plans to continue it's revitalization.  $5 million dollars in state funding is going towards new bike trails and recreational spaces for everyone who visits to enjoy starting next spring!pic.twitter.com/HM6PDj2CIL

html: Rinalli: The trail will open by Memorial Day between Terminals A & B. This is a big transformation (20% of the Outer Harbor). It's been an industrial brown field for decades and we're going to open it to public spaces for all ages and all abilities to enjoy.
text: Rinalli: The trail will open by Memorial Day between Terminals A & B. This is a big transformation (20% of the Outer Harbor). It's been an industrial brown field for decades and we're going to open it to public spaces for all ages and all abilities to enjoy.

html: After decades of sitting vacant we are transforming Buffalo's waterfront into a unique destination for residents and visitors to enjoy. Toured a new recreation area under construction on the Outer Harbor with our partners in government.pic.twitter.com/KssAGEuBbw
text:
After decades of sitting vacant we are transforming Buffalo's waterfront into a unique destination for residents and visitors to enjoy.
 
Toured a new recreation area under construction on the Outer Harbor with our partners in government.pic.twitter.com/KssAGEuBbw

html: The Buffalo VA Adult Day Health Care Program provides a retreat for the strongest and bravest among us who want nothing more than to again stand - or sit - shoulder to shoulder with their brothers and sisters who served. They fought for us and we will fight for them.pic.twitter.com/rnh69weO0l
text: The Buffalo VA Adult Day Health Care Program provides a retreat for the strongest and bravest among us who want nothing more than to again stand - or sit - shoulder to shoulder with their brothers and sisters who served.  They fought for us and we will fight for them.pic.twitter.com/rnh69weO0l

html: There is no good justification for ending the VA Adult Day Health Care Program, no immediate plans to demolish this building, and no evidence that the VA earnestly attempted to maintain the program at the existing site or an alternate location nearby.pic.twitter.com/QQeZRU1fLK
text: There is no good justification for ending the VA Adult Day Health Care Program, no immediate plans to demolish this building, and no evidence that the VA earnestly attempted to maintain the program at the existing site or an alternate location nearby.pic.twitter.com/QQeZRU1fLK

html: We still don't have a clear explanation from the VA in it's decision to close the Adult Day Health Care Program, which provides occupational and physical therapy to veterans. Caring for our veterans is not a business- their best interest must always come first.pic.twitter.com/Iuk6a62PPs
text: We still don't have a clear explanation from the VA in it's decision to close the Adult Day Health Care Program, which provides occupational and physical therapy to veterans. Caring for our veterans is not a business- their best interest must always come first.pic.twitter.com/Iuk6a62PPs

html: Today in 1956, President Eisenhower signed the National Interstate and Defense Highways Act, the largest public works project in American history. It is time once again that we must take bold, comprehensive action to repair and improve our country's infrastructure.pic.twitter.com/GssTDHyfvi
